message: Generated 5 comprehensive questions on schizophrenia spectrum disorders covering: (1) schizophrenia vs schizophreniform duration distinction, (2) brief psychotic disorder clinical application with stress trigger, (3) schizoaffective vs mood disorder with psychotic features (tricky differential), (4) delusional disorder with preserved functioning, (5) schizophreniform progression to schizophrenia

key_distinctions_addressed: 6-month threshold for schizophrenia vs 1-6 months for schizophreniform
1 day to <1 month for brief psychotic disorder with full recovery
2+ weeks of psychosis WITHOUT mood symptoms in schizoaffective disorder
Circumscribed delusions with preserved functioning in delusional disorder
Progression pathway from schizophreniform to schizophrenia
